description.en: When sent to a different world, Souta was given the unpopular profession of "Monster Tamer." However, Souta also got the skill "Absolute Domination" which gives him a 100% chance to capture anything!
description.es: Cuando fue enviado a un mundo diferente, Souta recibió la impopular profesión de "Domador de monstruos". ¡Sin embargo, Souta también obtuvo la habilidad "Dominación Absoluta" que le da un 100% de posibilidades de capturar cualquier cosa!
description.ru: Когда главного героя, Соуту, отправили в другой мир, ему досталась профессия "Укротителя монстров". К тому же, ему дали способность "Абсолютное доминирование", которая даёт ему 100% возможность получить всё что угодно.

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.vi: Tổ đội anh hùng đã đánh bại được quỷ vương và kết thúc cuộc hành trình của họ. Nhưng thế chưa phải là hết, cuộc đời của cô nàng pháp sư Elf này sẽ còn rất dài, hơn cả những người đồng đội cũ của cô, một cuộc phiêu lưu mới để cô trải qua nhiều cung bậc cảm xúc, cũng như là học hỏi thêm về con người.
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

description.en: "Uhm-uhm… N-Nice to meet you! I'm Nyoroko". A girl – not good at talking to people – is invited by her friend Matsuri and and challenged into doing a live broadcast for her first time. A youthful 4-koma comedy!

(from ebookjapan):

Some 3,500 years ago, the Arians living on the banks of the Indus River had established a caste system with Brahmins at the top. Shortly before the birth of Siddhartha, the hero of this story, Chapra, who was born a slave, became his adopted son after helping a general of the Kosala kingdom. 

He then hid his origins and sought the position of power, but Chapra, too, could not escape the curse of the status system... 

Here begins the epic story of the Buddha's life and the times in which he lived!

The complete biography of Buddha, as seen by Osamu Tezuka.  


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/buddha/)
- Indonesian release by Kepustakaan Populer Gramedia (KPG)



---
- **Won the 21st Bungei Shunju Manga Award in 1975, along with another short work of Tezuka's, Animal Tsurezuregusa (included in Paper Fortress)**
---
**Volumes 287-300 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs
Trapped in a Game That Flopped

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

altTitles.th: คู่ฮาวิวาห์กำมะลอ

description.en:
It's about a young divorcée who works in a bridal salon beneath her ex-husband who wants nothing more than for Naeko to forgive his cheating and she wanting nothing more to do with him. By chance she runs into the young man Ouji, who is in her dreams and they are going to get married?  
  
Spanish version created by Heaven of Temptation (ex FBD), Alura's World and Manganeko

altTitles.de: In der Stille schauen wir den Horizont

altTitles.en: In Silence, We Look at the Horizon

description.en: Riku is an elementary school boy who loves football. Yori is a high school girl who is the ex-girlfriend of Riku's brother, and she is full of secrets. This is a story of first love that unfolds with the sea breeze, from a pre-adolescent perspective.

altTitles.th: ระวังไว้ ยัยตัวร้ายกำลังมา

altTitles.ja: その悪女に気をつけてください

description.en:
Sit back and take in this romantic tale of an angelic heroine and her devoted suitors as they vie for the depths of her love... or not. This story’s about to go through some edits! After an accident, a modern-day college student awakens as the story’s villainess, Melissa Foddebrat. She’s far from anyone’s favorite, but she IS the daughter of the duke. Determined to live it up, this new Melissa is doing things her way — antiquated society, be damned! All idiots, prepare to step aside or perish!

---
A refreshing, unique villainess who's been dropped in the world of a novel, only to overthrow it all! The reason why? She couldn't just stand by and watch the female lead be manipulated by all four shitty male leads. The story of a pragmatic villainess who intends to throw out all the jackasses, the friendly heroine who is equally miffed at said idiots, and a wolf that only yearns for her!
description.es:
Una villana estimulante y única fue lanzada al mundo de una novela, ¡sólo para derribarlo todo! ¿Por qué? Ella simplemente no pudo quedarse quieta viendo a la protagonista siendo manipulada por la mierda de hombres protagonistas. ¡La historia de una villana pragmática que se da a la tarea de deshacerse de todos esos imbéciles, la heroína amistosa que está igualmente harta de esos idiotas y de un lobo que desea a la villana y a nadie más!

---

description.fr:
Réincarnée dans un roman à l’eau de rose, la voici qui endosse le rôle de méchante de l’histoire! Mais hors de question de se laisser marcher sur les pieds, que ce soit par l’héroïne ou ses prétendants. La première étape? Rompre ses fiançailles avec le prince héritier coureur de jupons. La seconde? Remettre tout le monde à sa place. Et la troisième? Qu’on lui fiche la paix!

description.id:
Aku menjadi pemeran antagonis! Apa aku membencinya? Tidak! Aku malah suka. Putri Duke: Pengangguran kaya. Ini adalah kesempatan terbaik untuk menikmati hidup. Aku harus mengubah cerita asli dan menjalani kehidupan yang aku inginkan! Tidak lama setelah bangun sebagai antagonis, aku melihat putra mahkota, tunangan sekaligus pemeran utama pria, berselingkuh. Apa aku menangis? Tentu saja... tidak! Air mataku terlalu sayang untuk menangisi si sampah itu! Dibanding menangis, aku malah berteriak: “Yang Mulia, anda sampah, ya?”

---

description.it:
Sono diventata la cattiva di un romanzo! Mi dispiace? No! Lo trovo piuttosto interessante. La figlia di un duca = una persona ricca senza lavoro. Come posso perdere un'occasione come questa ?! Questa è la migliore occasione per godersi la vita. Dovrei buttare via la trama principale e vivere la vita come voglio! Non molto tempo dopo essermi svegliata come la cattiva, ho visto il mio fidanzato, il protagonista maschile del romanzo, il principe, tradirmi. L'ho visto abbracciare una dama diversa da me e sorridendo così felicemente. Ero in lacrime... Ahahah! Stavo solo scherzando, non ho pianto! Le mie lacrime valgono troppo per essere sprecate per quella spazzatura. Invece delle lacrime, ho gridato: "Altezza, non crede di essere solo spazzatura?" Il personaggio principale con una personalità di una bibita rinfrescante! La protagonista di una shoujo per ragazze che stravolgerà completamente la storia principale! Perché? Perché è uno spreco per una ragazza essere circondata da questi uomini.

description.ko:
소설 속 희대의 악녀에 빙의했다! 싫냐고? 아니? 좋은데?
공작영애 = 돈 많은 백수인 것을 내가 마다할 리가! 꿀이나 빨면서 여유롭게 살기 딱 좋지 않은가? 원작같은 건 다 떨쳐버리고 나의 삶을 사는거야!

그렇게 다짐했던 내가 이 몸에 빙의한지 얼마 되지 않아 목격한 것은 나의 약혼남이자 원작의 남주인공인 '황태자 이안'의 불륜 현장이었다. 

내가 아닌 다른 여자를 품에 안고 시시덕거리는 그를 보며 나는 눈물……따윈 개뿔, 나오지도 않더라. 내 눈물은 비싸서 저런 쓰레기에게 흘리기엔 아깝거든. 눈물 대신 깊은 빡침을 담은 목소리로 물었다.

"전하는 개자식인가요?"

고구마밭에 떨어진 역대급 사이다 여주! 환장하는 원작을 뒤집어 엎기위한 걸크러쉬 그녀!
이유? 여주가 똥차같은 남주들에게 휘둘리기엔 너무 아까웠거든.

원작 여주에게 꼬이는 똥차들을 치우는 그녀와, 그녀만을 바라보는 늑댕이 한마리의 이야기!

description.ru:
Я стала злодейкой любовного романа. Думаете, меня что-то не устраивает? Нет, всё просто прекрасно. Статус дочери герцога даёт возможность жить в роскоши и комфорте, и я собираюсь извлечь всю выгоду из своего нынешнего положения. Но хотя я не хочу идти по пути антагонистки, белой и пушистой тоже не буду. Мой жених изменил мне с главной героиней, поэтому я перепишу оригинальную историю и поставлю всех на колени. Эти ублюдки не стоят моих слёз.

---

description.th:
เมื่อฉันได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุ เข้าไปอยู่ในนิยายเรื่องหนึ่งที่ฉันเคยอ่าน ซึ่งร่างที่ฉันอยู่นั้น เธอเป็นนางร้ายของเรื่อง ที่พยายามจะคว้าหัวใจขององค์ชายที่เป็นคู่หมั้นของเธอให้ได้ ซึ่งฉันเคยไม่ชอบเธอเอามากๆ แต่เมื่อได้เข้ามาอยู่แล้วถึงได้รู้ว่าโลกในนี้มันไม่ได้นำเสนอในทุกๆ ด้าน และด้านที่ฉันเห็นเป็นอีกด้านหนึ่งของนิยาย ซึ่งปรากฎว่ายูริ นางเอกตัวจริงของนิยายที่แสนจะน่าอิจฉาที่มีเหล่าผู้ชายมารุมล้อม จริงๆ แล้วเธอไม่ได้ชอบแบบนี้เลย ผู้ชายหลายคนต่างก็มีนิสัยอีกด้านหนึ่งซึ่งเป็นด้านมืดที่ไม่ได้ถ่ายทอดออกมาให้ได้อ่าน และฉัน เมลิซ่า นางร้ายคนนี้ก็จะเป็นนายร้ายให้สมกับชื่อ กำจัดพวกผู้ชายไปให้พ้นทางยูริให้ได้ โดยเฉพาะคู่หมั้นของฉัน

description.tr:
Bir romanın kötü karakteri oldum! Peki bundan nefret ediyor muyum? Hayır! Oldukça hoş buluyorum. Bir Dük’ün kızıyım; işi olmayan zengin biri. Böyle bir şansı nasıl kaçırabilirim?! Bu, hayatın tadını çıkarmak için en iyi şans. Novel’in ana konusuna uymayıp hayatımı nasıl istiyorsam öyle yaşamalıyım! Kötü karakter olarak uyandıktan kısa bir süre sonra, nişanlım, Novel’ın erkek ana karakteri olan veliaht prensin beni aldattığına şahit oldum. Onu, başka bir leydiyi kucaklarken gördüğümde çok parlak gülümsüyordu. Gözyaşlarına boğuldum… Şakaydı, ağlamadım! Gözyaşlarım o çöp herif için harcanamayacak kadar değerli. Ağlamak yerine, “Majesteleri siz bir or*spu çocuğu musunuz?” diye bağırdım. Ferahlatıcı bir sodaymışçasına bir kişiliğe sahip olan bir ana karakter! Kadın ana karakter ezici kişiliğiyle hikayeyi tamamen reddedecek! Neden mi? Çünkü bir kızın ucuz arabalarla çevirili olması israftan başka bir şey değildir. ( Ucuz arabalar = Erkekler)

description.uk:
Я стала лиходійкою любовного роману. Думаєте, мене щось не влаштовує? Ні, все чудово. Статус дочки герцога дає можливість жити в розкоші та комфорті, і я маю намір отримати всю вигоду зі свого нинішнього становища. Але, хоча я не хочу йти шляхом антагоністки, білої і пухнастої теж не буду. Мій наречений зрадив мені з головною героїнею, тому я перепишу оригінальну історію та поставлю всіх на коліна. Ці виродки не варті моїх сліз.

公爵家族的千金小姐=有钱的无业游民，嗯，这不是很正常的嘛?为什么要自己为难自己，坐在花园里喝喝蜂蜜茶看看风景什么的不是很好吗?原作?那是什么?给我走开!由于一系列原因，我成为了这局身体的主人。没过多久，我就撞破了我未婚夫的出轨现场。哦，对了，我的未婚夫就是皇太子，也是这本书的男主角。看着一脸笑嘻...

Uma vilã diferente e única que foi lançada no mundo de um romance, apenas para derrubar tudo! Por quê? Ela não podia simplesmente ficar parada vendo a protagonista ser manipulada pelos quatro protagonistas masculinos de merda. A história de uma vilã pragmática que pretende expulsar todos os imbecis, a heroína amigável que fica igualmente irritada com os ditos idiotas e um lobo que apenas anseia pela vilã!

description.zh-hk:
我穿越成為小說中的絕世惡女了!
難不難過?不，我高興得要命呢!
公爵千金 = 多金又閒閒沒事幹，瘋了才拒絕!
可以吃大餐又活得消遙自在不是很好嗎?
擺脫原著的設定，活出屬於我的人生吧!

我下定決心後不久，便目擊了我的未婚夫，
也就是小說男主角——「皇太子伊安」的出軌現場。
看到他抱著另一個女人有說有笑，
我的眼淚就掉了下來...才怪，我根本就哭不出來!
為那種垃圾落下我珍貴的眼淚實在太浪費了!
於是我怒氣沖沖地問他...

「殿下，你是狗嗎?」

掉進鬱悶世界的超級豪邁女主角!
為了推翻荒謬的原著而來，充滿Girl Crush的她!
原因?當然是因為那些爛男人配不上女主角!

一個努力擺脫爛男人糾纏的女主角，
以及一名眼裡只有她的狼人的故事!

description.en: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

description.fr:
Avec le cœur tremblant, il s’est présenté au rendez-vous arrangé tout en dissimulant sa véritable identité.

“Voici mon grand-père, mon père, ma mère, mon grand frère et mon oncle !”

Pourquoi, bon sang, tous ces foutus héros sont-ils rassemblés devant moi ?!

Il s’avère que la famille de ma petite amie est une lignée de héros parmi les plus puissants ?!

An Jae-rim, un vilain connu sous le nom de “Exécuteur”, tente de jouer le rôle du gendre parfait tout en cachant sa véritable identité et en essayant de se débarrasser de sa belle-famille. Mais ce n’est pas aussi simple qu’il le pensait !

Pour couronner le tout, ils me prennent pour un aspirant héros alors que je suis un méchant !

Une comédie d’action hilarante pleine de tension et de rebondissements !

Adaptation manga du light novel *Fate/Prototype -Fragments d'Azur et d'Acier-* de Hikaru Sakurai et Nakahara

Manaka Sajô est issue d'une puissante famille de mages et est considérée comme un véritable prodige. C'est donc naturellement qu'elle est choisie pour participer à l'une des Guerre du Saint Graal.
Malgré son jeune âge, elle parvient à invoquer le plus puissant des Servant : Saber. Mais leur relation va très vite se dégrader car ils n'ont pas du tout la même conception du monde et de la guerre.

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

description.en:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...

[Yen Press English Simulpub](https://yenpress.com/series/the-summer-hikaru-died-manga-serial)
description.fr: Hikaru et Yoshiki sont deux amis d'enfance qui ont grandi ensemble dans un hameau reculé. Mais un jour, les doutes qu'éprouvait Yoshiki depuis quelque temps se confirment : depuis sa disparition en forêt, six mois plus tôt, Hikaru a été remplacé par... "autre chose". Malgré cet effroyable constat, Yoshiki refuse d'être séparé de son ami. Il fait alors le choix de poursuivre son quotidien aux côtés de cet "être" à l'image parfaite de Hikaru. Mais au même moment, d'étranges incidents se produisent çà et là dans le village...
description.es-la:
“Así que, Hikaru ya no está… Si eso es verdad, entonces…” 

Yoshiki y Hikaru son dos chicos que viven en cierto pueblo. Tienen la misma edad y siempre han estado juntos mientras crecían. Pero, un día, Yoshiki se da cuenta que “una cosa” tomó el lugar de Hikaru. Incluso después de saber eso, Yoshiki aún quiere que estén juntos. Y así, su vida con esa “cosa” que se parece a su amigo comienza. 

Al mismo tiempo, incidentes extraños continúan ocurriendo en el pueblo...
description.pt-br:
"Então, Hikaru não está mais aqui... Se isso for verdade, então..."

Yoshiki e Hikaru são dois garotos que vivem em uma certa vila. Eles têm a mesma idade e sempre estiveram juntos enquanto cresciam. Mas, um dia, Yoshiki percebeu que "algo" havia tomado o lugar de Hikaru. Mesmo depois de descobrir isso, Yoshiki ainda quer que eles fiquem juntos. E assim, sua vida com o "algo" que se parece com seu amigo começa.

Ao mesmo tempo, incidentes estranhos continuam acontecendo na vila...

description.en: Pokemon Sword and Shield Manga Adaptation, featuring Gear Meister Soudo and computer scientist Schildemilia.

Life's an adventure dammit!

A group of high-school kids goofing around instead of studying, teachers struggling to get a grip on their work and personal lives, a man worrying about his looks, and so on.
This surreal comedy is full of odd, interesting, positively absurd people who live in dizzying harmony, dealing with the nonsense of daily life. Beauty in chaos. Sunshine in disaster.

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated and I'm Overly Cute, So I'll Strive to Become the Beloved Character

description.en:
I was hit by a car while protecting a child, and before I knew it, I had been reincarnated in another world as Yumie Granbell, the extraordinarily beautiful daughter of a count.
When I looked in the mirror, the reflection staring back at me was that of an angelic girl, absolutely peerless in beauty!

The Granbell family, into which I was born in this life, is a prestigious magical family with considerable influence.
I thought I had hit the jackpot, reincarnating into a winning life, but it turned out that the family was on the verge of collapse.
And to make things worse, the cause of that collapse was... ME!?

Now, I want to finally obtain the family I've always dreamed of!
With my cuteness, I'll solve any problem and restore the family to its former glory!

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)

___
Alternative raw: [Niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69838)

When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: Kaibutsu-tachi wo Suberu Mono - Saikyou no Shien Tokka Nouryoku de, Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou Party ni!

altTitles.ja: 怪物たちを統べるモノ 最強の支援特化能力で、気付けば世界最強パーティーに！

altTitles.en: The Boy Who Rules the Monsters

description.en: Black Tiger is a party of five young prodigy adventurers hailed as the Miracle Children across the land. Yet, among them, Sol Rock stood apart from the rest. Branded as a worthless support mage and treated like a mere expendable grunt. One day, after completing their promotion quest, he was told he wasn’t strong enough to keep up and was kicked out. What they didn’t know was that Sol Rock possessed the greatest power of all: the “Player,” a godlike talent that allows him to buff his allies and dominate the battlefield. Now, cast out and alone, Sol Rock is determined to prove his worth. He sets out to gather the strongest group the world has ever seen!
description.ja:
『奇跡の子』が集った、新進気鋭の天才冒険者パーティー『黒虎』。偉業を成し遂げるそのパーティーで、ソル・ロックは『雑用』と揶揄され唯一頼りない支援術士と思われていた。５人で討伐を終えたある日ーーソルは『力不足』だと仲間に告げられ、そのままパーティーから追放されてしまう。

しかし…ソルの本当の能力『プレイヤー』は、『仲間』に強力なジョブやスキルを与え、超強化する神の如き最強の力だった！追放されたソルは、最強の支援特化能力で最強のパーティーを作り上げるべく動き出し…？

altTitles.en: 優良少女ファミリヤン

description.en: The meetings and conversations of yankee girls at a family restaurant. Sometimes observed by an unknown salaryman who overhears their conversations.

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Ouji, "Auto Craft" Skill de Ryouchi o Bakusoku de Kaitakushi Saikyou no Mura o Tsukutte Shimau

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生王子、『自動製作《オートクラフト》』スキルで領地を爆速で開拓し最強の村を作ってしまう　〜最強クラフトスキルで始める、楽々領地開拓スローライフ〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Ouji, "Jidou Seisaku" Skill de Ryouchi o Bakusoku de Kaitakushi Saikyou no Mura o Tsukutte Shimau: Saikyou Crafting Skill de Hajimeru, Rakuraku Ryouchi Kaitaku Slow Life

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Useless Prince Exiled to the Land of Death, Creates the Strongest Village by Expanding his Territory at Lightning Speed with the Skill Auto Craft: Starting a Leisurely Life of Territory Development with the Strongest Craft Skill

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生王子、『自動製作』スキルで領地を爆速で開拓し最強の村を作ってしまう　ー最強クラフトスキルで始める、楽々領地開拓スローライフー

description.en:
Third Prince Theodulf has been banished to a wasteland known as the Land of Death because he didn’t receive a gift from the Goddess. It’s a barren land where the air is so noxious, nothing can grow there. Surviving there is impossible…or so everyone thought! As it turns out, Theodulf is a reincarnated being and has received a power known as “Auto-Craft” from the Goddess. Using this powerful gift to automatically create everything, the prince proceeds to turn the Land of Death into one brimming with life!!

(Source: K Manga)
description.ja: 「貴様を死の大地の領主に任命する!!」第三王子テオドルフは、女神からギフトを貰えなかったことを理由に、死の大地と呼ばれる不毛の地へ追放されてしまう！作物も育たない、瘴気にまみれたその地で生き残ることは不可能……に思われたが、実は転生者であるテオドルフには女神より貰ったある「力」があった！その力は「自動製作《オートクラフト》」!!あらゆる物を全自動で作り出すこのチートギフトで、死の大地を楽々開拓していく——!!

altTitles.en: This gender-bent girl lost everything within ten days
The gender-bent girl who lost many things.

altTitles.ja: 世界の終わりの世界録

altTitles.th: อองกอร์ ล่าบันทึกวีรบุรุษสุดขอบโลก

description.en:
The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now!  
  


---
description.fr:
À la fin de la Guerre de la Fin, le Héros vaillant, Elline, laissa derrière lui un trésor inestimable, l’Encore, archive contenant tout de ce monde, de sa création à sa réincarnation. Les pays du monde envoyèrent des équipes d’aventuriers à la recherche de l’Encore, et formèrent la jeunesse pour leur futur. Ren E. Maxwell, un épéiste en devenir sans talent, est moqué par tous ces camarades : copie conforme d’Elline, il est appelé le Faux héros vaillant. Un jour cependant, il fit la rencontre de Kylse, ancienne équipière d’Elline. Celle-ci le confond alors avec Elline… La légende du Faux héros vaillant commence ici!  
  


---

description.ja: 伝説の英勇エルラインが遺した至宝『世界録』の在り処を世界中の国や組織が求める世界録大争奪時代―エルラインそっくりの容姿を持つ少年レンと伝説の竜姫キリシェの出会いから、伝説の再来が始まる！
description.pt: O valioso tesouro, o "Encore", que foi deixado pelo lendário Bravo Herói, Elline, tem a gravação do fim do mundo e a reencarnação do mundo. Os países e as brigadas (partes) em todo o mundo estão buscando a localização do seu paradeiro; a era de lutas pelo Encore. O garoto chamado Ren que quer se tornar um cavaleiro, mas não tem talento empunhando espadas, apesar de procurar ser exatamente como o Elline the Brave Hero, ele tem tido um estilo de vida onde as pessoas zombam dele como o "Falso Bravo Herói". O que aparece na frente dele é a lendária Princesa Dragão Krische, que tinha acordado de seu selamento. Ela confunde Ren com Elline, embora ela fica decepcionada, pois ele simplesmente parece com ele, mas ela mais tarde descobre um potencial oculto nele. E ela o convida para a viagem para encontrar o Encore, juntamente com a Arcanja Phia e a Lorde Demônio Elise que salvaram o mundo antes. "Você quer vir conosco?." - Este é o prelúdio de excitação selvagem desempenhado pelos heróis. O garoto conhecido como o falso com seu caminho cruzado com a lenda Bravo Herói começa agora!
description.pt-br: O valioso tesouro, o “Encore”, deixado pelo lendário Bravo Herói, Elline, tem a gravação do fim do mundo e a reencarnação do mundo. Os países e os grupos de aventureiros em todo o mundo, estão buscando sua localização. O garoto chamado Ren que quer se tornar um cavaleiro, mas não tem talento empunhando espadas, apesar de procurar ser exatamente como o Elline o Bravo Herói, ele tem sido menosprezado pelas pessoas que o chamam de “Falso Bravo Herói”. Quem aparece na frente dele é a lendária Princesa dos Dragões, Kyelse, que acordou de seu selamento. Ela confunde Ren com Elline, embora fique decepcionada, pois ele é simplesmente alguém parecido ao seu falecido companheiro, mais tarde um potencial oculto é descoberto nele, então ela o convida para uma viagem em busca do Encore, com a Arcanjo, Fear e a Lorde Demônio, Elise, que salvaram o mundo anteriormente. “Você quer vir conosco?.” – Este é o prelúdio de excitação selvagem desempenhado pelos heróis. O garoto conhecido como uma cópia barata tem seu caminho cruzado com a lenda do Bravo Herói! 68 Visualizações totais, 68 Visualizações hoje

description.en:
Imagine waking to a world where every last human has been mysteriously turned to stone…  

One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he's not alone! His science-loving friend Senku's been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!
description.it: Anno 5738: da migliaia di anni l'intera umanità si ritrova tramutata in pietra a causa di una catastrofe naturale. Ooki Taiju riesce inspiegabilmente a risvegliarsi, trovandosi così di fronte ad una realtà completamente diversa da quanto ricordava, dove la natura ha ripreso il sopravvento sulla civiltà umana. Al suo risveglio il ragazzo si ricongiunge con il suo amico Senkuu, un giovane e geniale scienziato anche lui risvegliatosi qualche mese prima. Insieme i ragazzi sperano di scoprire la causa dietro all'improvvisa tramutazione in pietra - e, nel frattempo, di trovare una cura. Non tutto, però, va come previsto...
description.pt: Imagina acordar em um mundo onde cada humano foi misteriosamente transformado em pedra… Em um dia fatídico, toda a humanidade foi petrificada em um piscar de olhos. Depois de muitos milênios, o aluno do ensino médio, Taiju, acorda e se encontra perdido em um mundo de estátuas. Entretanto, ele não está sozinho! Seu amigo que ama ciência, Senku, está acordado e correndo pelos últimos meses e ele tem um grande plano em mente, recomeçar a civilização com o poder da ciência!
description.ru: Однажды, когда Тайджу пытался собраться с духом, чтобы признаться девушке в любви, небо заполнил странный свет. Все люди, на которых он падал, превращались в камень. После без малого четырёх тысяч лет он наконец выбирается из каменного плена и начинает исследовать окрестности. Неожиданно Тайджу встречается его старый друг Сенку, очнувшийся полгода назад. Сенку приводит Тайджу в свой примитивный дом на дереве и просит помощи в возрождении исчезнувшей человеческой цивилизации, начиная с попыток выяснить истинную природу света, который превратил людей в камень.
description.pt-br: Um dia fatídico, toda a humanidade foi petrificada por um flash ofuscante de luz. Depois de vários milênios, o colegial Taiju desperta e se vê perdido em um mundo de estátuas. No entanto, ele não está sozinho! Seu amigo de ciência Senku está em funcionamento há alguns meses e ele tem um grande plano em mente: dar o pontapé inicial na civilização com o poder da ciência!

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: Senki Survival Saga: Isekai no Unmei o Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu

altTitles.ja: 戦姫サバイバルサガ〜異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊〜
戦姫サバイバルサガ-異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊-

altTitles.ja-ro: Senki Survival Saga ~Isekai no Unmei wo Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu~

altTitles.en: Warrior Princess Survival Saga: The Unsanctioned Intergender Relations on a Deserted Island, Battling for the Fate of Another World

description.en:
Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic...!?

A survival comedy featuring the most powerful and beautiful girls from another world and an older man washed ashore on an uninhabited island!

(Source: Kadokawa)
description.ja:
千年に一人と言われる魔法の才能を持つエルフ・アナスタシアは、異世界で三つ巴の戦争の最終決戦へと赴く。
仇敵である魔族との戦いの最中激しい光に身を包まれたアナスタシアが目を覚ますとそこは、無人島であった。
無人島を散策するアナスタシアの前に謎の人間が現れ、しかも魔法が使えなくなっており…！？
異世界から来た最強美少女たちと無人島に流れ着いたオッサンによるサバイバルコメディ！

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

description.pt-br:
Após salvar um mundo, o guerreiro Kim Minsu retorna à Terra apenas para descobrir que perdeu tudo… então ele decide destruir o mundo que costumava chamar de lar.

Em sua fúria, ele mata o adolescente Jeongsu Park e sua família. Mas, em vez de morrer normalmente, Jeongsu é transportado para outro mundo, onde descobre que agora é um guerreiro. Depois de matar o rei demônio desse mundo alternativo e aperfeiçoar suas habilidades como guerreiro, Jeongsu retorna à Terra, determinado a se vingar de Minsu.

Enquanto os dois guerreiros lutam com o destino do país em jogo, quem sairá vitorioso?
description.zh-hk:
為了報仇雪恨這唯一念頭而拯救異世界的勇士，雖然拯救了自己，卻拯救不了原本世界的他，決心要殺光毀滅世界的勇士們。 這是關於沒有幸福結局的冷酷現實，以及殺勇者們的勇者的故事。

title.en: There's a Rat in Our House

altTitles.en: There Is a Mouse in My House
There's a Mouse in my House

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

title.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

description.en: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

altTitles.ja: デビィ・ザ・コルシファは負けず嫌い

description.en:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
description.es:
"¡Lo sé! ¡Destruiré a algunos humanos para matar el tiempo!"

¡El demonio más fuerte de todos los tiempos hace una aparición inesperada! Pero es... ¡una cabeza hueca total! ¡Comienza una comedia sobre un demonio torpe pero émulo que intenta matar el tiempo!
description.ja: 「暇つぶしに人間でも滅ぼすかのう！」突如として現れた、史上最強の悪魔！でもコイツ...チョロすぎ!?ポンコツだけど負けず嫌いな悪魔と繰り広げる暇つぶしコメディー、開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды в комнату Рокуро неожиданно заявился сильнейший в мире демон! Но постойте, что же это... Неужто она настолько пустоголовая!? Встречайте великолепную комедийную историю о неуклюжем демоне, пытающимся скоротать время за людскими играми!
description.es-la:
"¡Lo sé! ¡Destruiré a algunos humanos para matar el tiempo!"

¡El demonio más fuerte de todos los tiempos hace una aparición inesperada! Pero es... ¡una cabeza hueca total! ¡Comienza una comedia sobre un demonio torpe pero émulo que intenta matar el tiempo!

description.en:
'I wish I'd never been reborn as a twin from the royal family.'

This was the only wish in my heart on the night I was framed and died. To think I would be betrayed by my twin older sister whom I believed was destined to be my better half.

However, why on earth did I return to the past out of nowhere! I'm just an ordinary citizen who never dreamed of defeating my chosen older sister! I really, really didn't, but...

"Oh my, wawawa! Has our cutie pie baby daughter awwived?"
A mother who becomes a fool for her beloved daughter.

"Dada... Did you say it, baby?"
A father who's a crybaby when it comes to me.

"Can... I give you a hug, too?"
My mom's first knight, who was called both a mad dog and a loyal dog.

"Bicbic! Beepp!"
A bird which almost lost its life and was saved.

"Only your highness is the owner of my heart now."
The top nobleman of the kingdom whom my 7 year-old sister had a crush on.

"Become the first holy king to manage the wizard."
The crazy wizard called God's mistake.

"I promise I will choose you forever."
Even the prince of an enemy country...

Everyone is on my side.

At this point, isn't it worth giving it a try?

This is the story of a twin sister who has to defeat her older twin against all odds. It is a child care story and the survival of a twin princess!
description.ko:
운명의 반쪽인 줄 알았던 쌍둥이 언니에게서 처절하게 배신당했다.
누명을 쓰고 죽던 밤, 마음으로 빌었던 소원은 단 한 가지.

‘다시는 왕가의 쌍둥이로 태어나지 않게 하소서.’

그런데, 왜 난데없이 과거로 돌아오는 거냐고요!
나는 선택받은 언니를 이겨 먹을 꿈은 꿔 본 적도 없는 그런 소시민인데?
정말, 정말 그랬었는데…….

“오구구구, 우리 딸 와쩌여?”
“아빠……라고 했니, 아가?”

딸바보 엄마와 짠내 나는 아빠야 그렇다 치고

“제가…… 안아 드려도 됩니까?” 충견을 넘어 광견으로 불리던 엄마의 제1 기사와
“삑삑! 삐이이이익!” 겨울잠 잘 뻔한 뱁새(?),
“오직 저하만이 제 마음의 주인이신걸요.” 언니를 짝사랑하던 왕국 최고 귀족 놈과,
“마법사를 부리는 최초의 신성 왕이 되어 봐.” 신의 실수라 불리던 미친 마법사,
“영원히 그대를 선택하기로 약속합니다.” 적국이었던 제국의 황태자까지도,

모두 모두 내 편이다?
이쯤 되면 한번 해 볼 만하지 않습니까?

예지자 언니를 이기고 아등바등 살아남을 쌍둥이 동생의 이야기.
본격 양친이 다 살아 있는 양육물, 쌍둥이 왕녀로 살아남기!

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼
description.vi: Bí mật giữa mình và cậu ấy tuy bình thường nhưng quan trọng!Hajime Takahashi nhập học tại trường cao trung Shuubi chỉ vì nơi đó là thánh địa trong bộ truyện tranh cậu yêu thích. Tất cả mọi ngóc ngách của trường đều được phác họa trong bộ truyện, điều đó khiến cậu phấn khích tột cùng! Giữa không khí hào hứng, Takahashi gặp một cô gái xinh đẹp giống hệt nữ chính trong tác phẩm yêu thích của mình, Yayoi Kurokawa, và họ đã sẻ chia bí mật của bản thân với nhau.

description.en:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

altTitles.uk: Помовч, зла драконихо! Я не буду виховувати з тобою дітей!

altTitles.zh-ro: Bizui Elong Wo Bu Xiang Zai Gen Ni Dai Haizi Le

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...
description.uk:
Після поразки та полону, вбивця драконів Леон потрапив у полон до королеви клану Срібних Драконів. Усвідомлюючи наближення смерті, він використав заборонену техніку, щоб накласти прокляття на королеву, але несподівано королева втратила контроль.

Він думав, що це змусить королеву жити з соромом до кінця життя, і це буде гідно титулу вбивці драконів.

Але через два роки, коли Леон розплющив очі, поруч з ним сиділа дівчинка-дракон із хвостиком...

altTitles.fr: Les anecdotes de la Shadows Draconis

description.fr: Salutations jeunes lecteurs et lectrices parvenus dans nos contrées par curiosité. Si certains parmi vous sauront de quoi je parle d'autres non. Alors allez lire "Akuyaku reijou no shitsuji sama drapeau hametsu wa ore ga tsubusasete itadakimasu" car ici n'est à lire que le concentré des chaps bonus pour les rares affamés, lecteurs de ces chapitres. Le spoil, c'est le mal. Alors gardez-vous si vous n'avez pas lu l'œuvre. (Comparer au reste des œuvres où l'on sort un chap par mois. Ici sera publié 1 chapitre tous les deux semaines) Bien à vous et bonne lecture

title.en: Is My Second Life a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

altTitles.en: My Second Life Is a  Healing Life?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en:
With the rising tide of steam power and machinery, who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness, who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?  
  
Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries, Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery, cannons, dreadnoughts, airships, difference machines, as well as Potions, Divination, Hexes, Tarot Cards, Sealed Artifacts…  
  
The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the world—both orthodox and unorthodox—while he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.  
  
Like the corresponding tarot card, The Fool, which is numbered 0—a number of unlimited potential—this is the legend of "The Fool."
description.ru: После переселения в мир пара и машин, главный герой Клейн Моретти все больше запутывается в своем путешествии по этому странному сверхъестественному миру, желая найти путь назад. В процессе изучения магической медицины, гадания, запечатанных предметов, всего сверхъестесственного и отбиваясь от всякой чертовщины, он случайно создал легенду о "Шуте"!
